title: Wild crocodile hunt [B&W]
creator_credit: PJP Productions, Phillip J Phillips and Lynn Laurence
brief_description: A film about a crocodile hunt beginning at Coen, last town on Cape York Peninsula, North Queensland, and ending at Annie River. Shows skinning of crocodile with the carcass being left behind for the carrier to collect. Includes scenes of crocodiles being shot, with some only being wounded and able to escape the hunters. Narration by John Scott Griffiths. Photography by Rene Henri.
